Container.Name: Moltbot
Container.Overview:
Moltbot (OpenClaw) is a local-first, highly capable AI agent.
**Configuration:** 1. After starting, check the logs. You may need to run the onboarding wizard manually if the token is not set. 2. To run commands, open the Unraid console for this container and use: `docker compose run --rm openclaw-cli onboard` or edit the config files in your appdata folder.

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: The port for the Moltbot Gateway UI.

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: Persistent storage for Moltbot configuration and memory.

Config.Name: Gateway Token
Config.Description: Secure token for the gateway. If left blank, one may be generated in the logs/config.

Config.Name: Anthropic API Key
Config.Description: API Key for Claude (optional, can be set in UI).

Config.Name: OpenAI API Key
Config.Description: API Key for OpenAI (GPT-4o, o1, etc).

Config.Name: Google Gemini API Key
Config.Description: API Key for Google Gemini models.

Config.Name: OpenAI Base URL
Config.Description: Override the Base URL. Useful for local LLMs (Ollama) or proxies.

Config.Name: Bind Address
Config.Description: Fixes 'Site can't be reached'. Forces app to listen on all interfaces.

Config.Name: Allow Insecure Auth
Config.Description: Fixes 'Disconnected: HTTPS required'. Allows access via local IP.
